ghostPost.title: Lynx Roundup, September 12th
ghostPost.excerpt: Scientific Python in the browser!  Visualizing Random Forests!  Multiple random bits I found on doing things with SQL that you probably shouldn't do!

authors.name: Matthew Alhonte
authors.bio: Super villain in somebody's action hero movie. Experienced a radioactive freak accident at a young age, which rendered him part-snake and strangely adept at Python.
